setDisposition()

setDisposition(string $disposition, string $name, string $filename) : void

Sets the Disposition header for this part.

Parameters

string $disposition

The disposition; e.g., 'form-data'.
string $name

The field name to use for this part, if any.
string $filename

The filename to use for this part, if any.

Tags

None found

setEncoding()

setEncoding(string $encoding) : void

Sets the Content-Encoding header for this part.

HTTP, unlike MIME, does not use Content-Transfer-Encoding, and does use Transfer-Encoding and Content-Encoding. -- http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html#sec14.15, the "Note" at the end.

Parameters

string $encoding

The encoding used.

Tags

None found
